title: SwiftCart Retail API
description:
- The backbone of the SwiftCart e-commerce ecosystem.
-- High-performance order processing.
-- Multi-vendor support architecture.
- Integrated with global shipping providers.
1. Real-time inventory synchronization.
2. Secure payment gateway via Stripe.

customTypes.name: Product
customTypes.definition: { id: string, name: string, price: number, stock_count(Admin): number, vendor_id(Admin): string }

customTypes.name: Order
customTypes.definition: { id: string, items: Product[], total: number, customer_id: string, internal_notes(Staff): string }

customTypes.name: Customer
customTypes.definition: { id: string, email: string, loyalty_tier: string, shipping_address: object }

endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available products. Stock counts are only visible to administrative staff.
Place a new order. Standard customers can only view their own orders.
